context_bundle.summary: Python web framework patterns covering FastAPI for modern async APIs, Flask for lightweight applications, Django for full-featured web apps, with authentication, validation, and deployment best practices

onboarding.quick_start: pip install fastapi uvicorn[standard] && uvicorn main:app --reload && curl http://localhost:8000/docs
common_patterns: FastAPI basic: 'from fastapi import FastAPI; app = FastAPI(); @app.get("/") async def root(): return {"message": "Hello"}'
Path parameters: '@app.get("/items/{item_id}") async def read_item(item_id: int): return {"item_id": item_id}'
Request body: 'from pydantic import BaseModel; class Item(BaseModel): name: str; @app.post("/items/") async def create(item: Item): return item'
Dependency injection: 'from fastapi import Depends; def get_db(): db = Database(); yield db; @app.get("/users/") async def users(db = Depends(get_db)): return db.query()'
Background tasks: 'from fastapi import BackgroundTasks; @app.post("/send/") async def send(background_tasks: BackgroundTasks): background_tasks.add_task(send_email)'
CORS middleware: 'from fastapi.middleware.cors import CORSMiddleware; app.add_middleware(CORSMiddleware, allow_origins=["*"])'
Flask route: 'from flask import Flask, jsonify; app = Flask(__name__); @app.route("/api/data") def get_data(): return jsonify({"data": []})'
Django view: 'from django.http import JsonResponse; def api_view(request): return JsonResponse({"status": "ok"})'
known_errors: Uvicorn not found: Install with 'pip install uvicorn[standard]' for full features including websockets
Pydantic validation error: Check request body matches model schema, use 'response_model' for output validation
CORS error: Add CORSMiddleware with appropriate origins, credentials, and methods
Async function in sync context: Use 'async def' for route handlers in FastAPI, or 'asyncio.run()' for sync code
Database connection not closed: Use dependency with 'yield' for proper cleanup, or context managers
Static files not served: Mount static directory with 'app.mount("/static", StaticFiles(directory="static"), name="static")'
